abstract: Shares in Rio Tinto, the global mining giant, jumped 5 percent in a weak market on Wednesday, swept up by rumors ranging from a sweetened cash bid by BHP Billiton to a Chinese counterbid.
lead_paragraph: Shares in Rio Tinto, the global mining giant, jumped 5 percent in a weak market on Wednesday, swept up by rumors ranging from a sweetened cash bid by BHP Billiton to a Chinese counterbid.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Jumps on Bid Rumors
